product_name: The North Face Dipsea 78 Racer Shoes - Men's
long_description: Named for the iconic Dipsea cross-country race, the Dipsea 78 Racer Shoes from The North Face combine cool retro style with modern touches such as Vibram rubber outsoles for around-town comfort.
short_description: Named for the iconic Dipsea cross-country race, the Dipsea 78 Racer Shoes from The North Face combine cool retro style with modern touches such as Vibram rubber outsoles for around-town comfort.
